article_title: Court delays approval of sale process for bankrupt Hardwick Clothes in Cleveland

article_metadata.description: As head of one of America's last remaining domestic suit makers, Tommy Hopper was where he had hoped his family's business would never be on Thursday - in federal bankruptcy court trying to sell the struggling business to save the 135-year-old company.
